description: Gained experience in web development and troubleshooting computer-related issues. Designed and maintained responsive websites, resolved compatibility and functionality issues, and provided technical support.

Built custom, user-centric web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. Automated workflows and optimized application performance using Flask and Django. Designed and deployed scalable solutions, incorporating REST APIs and ensuring responsive designs. Developed dynamic dashboards and data visualization tools with Power BI and Excel.

Implemented web scraping and automation using Python and Selenium. Developed and maintained scalable web applications with React and Flask. Automated workflows using Laravel and Python, improving operational efficiency. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
Analyzing data, creating reports, and providing insights using Excel. Developed dynamic dashboards and data visualization tools to support decision-making.
